# version

## Synopsis
**ramalama version**

## Description
Print version of RamaLama

## Options

#### **--help**, **-h**
Print usage message

## Examples

```bash
$ ramalama version
ramalama version 0.15.0
$ ramalama -q version
0.15.0
>
```
